derivation: from G473 (ἀνθομολογέομαι) and the middle voice of G3670 (ἀνθομολογέομαι);
strongs_def: to confess in turn, i.e. respond in praise
outline:
1. to reply by professing or by confessing
  2. to agree mutually (in turn), to make a compact
  3. to acknowledge in the presence of
    1. to give thanks
